Driftwood offers a collection of 14 light and airy 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes featuring lofted ceilings, decks with views to the south, and clean, contemporary interiors. The European-inspired design provides larger than average interior spaces in an efficient building. Walking distance access to the commercial center of town and the marina makes car-free living a reality.  “The Driftwood team has a deep interest in sustainable, community-minded living and a special connection with Gibsons, a community close to our hearts. Driftwood is proud to bring Passive House living to the Sunshine Coast, designing quality residences that tread lightly on the earth and that will keep their value far into the future.”
